verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Behold I am the Lord
The God of All flesh

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Is there anything
Is there anything
Too hard for me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Is there anything, anything, anything
Too hard for me
Is there anything, anything, anything
Too hard for me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There isn't anything, anything, anything
Too hard for me
There isn't anything, anything, anything
Too hard for me
